text: Hey, look, look! Something’s coming our way~!
Alright, everyone~! Let’s do this together~!
Dance or it’s a big ol’ loss!
Welcome to the golden paradise, Gold Saucer!
I am Dio, the park’s director!
Young one, the moment of battle arrives without warning!
Hahaha! Let’s start with some light practice!
Now for the real deal—bring it on!
Cloud, you really gave it your all!
That was a fine match, young one!
Now, let’s give tonight’s challenger another round of thunderous applause!
This is a small token of my appreciation.
Enjoy the Gold Saucer to your heart’s content!
Cloud’s used to this stuff. Last time, at the Honeybee Inn—
Welcome to the golden paradise, the Gold Saucer!
I got to witness your heated battle with Warden Dio.
As always, you stand out. It’s like you’ve set your heart free.
I’ve been asked to oversee a certain performance.
I’m here to choreograph a dance.
If you feel like dancing, give me a shout. I’ll keep a role ready for you.
If Cloud joined in, it’d be quite the inspiration.
You seem to be having fun. This is a golden paradise—enjoy it to the fullest!
Well then, shall we have some fun too?
Didn’t we already mess around in Costa?
Who’s up for just a little fun time!?
You ain’t exactly itchin’ to play, right? Just crash at the inn already.
Man, they’re all so damn giddy.
If the mako runs out, this place is done.
What’s with you all of a sudden?
Oh, I get it. Yeah, now’s the time alright.
Your buddies—the slum flower girl, the lab rat.
Looks like they’re finally getting serious about the wanted list.
I think it’s a good move.
That’s not the point! Why am I the one delivering this?
I’m the head of the space division!
Doesn’t that just mean they trust you?
How much damn mako are they burnin’ for this kiddie crap!?
In other words, the Lifestream—the planet’s blood!
You’ve got a real weird mug on ya!
How about I read your fortune, you two?
A bright future, a fun future—if it’s a rotten one, don’t blame me!
Hey, big guy, over here, over here!
I’m Cait Sith, the fortune-tellin’ machine!
A stuffed robot, huh? Pretty well made.
This place is for forgettin’ your daily woes and havin’ a good time!
I’m actually pretty popular ‘round here, y’know?
This hotel got no intention of lettin’ folks rest?
Don’t sneak up on me like that!
You got rooms? Two guys, three gals.
What kind of pet might that be?
Make it three guys, three gals.
My apologies. We’re fully booked tonight.
All hotels in the Gold Saucer are fully booked tonight.
Hello there, you in a pickle?
If ya like, I can snag ya a room!
Tryin’ to rip us off, huh?
No way, I wouldn’t do that! Heck, I’ll even cover the cost if ya want!
Sorry, pal, but could ya check again?
Good news—a cancellation just came up!
We’ve got the Tonberry Room and the Eligor Room available. How does that sound?
Bein’ nice feels good, huh? Well then, take it easy!
Your rooms are on the 4th floor.
Please take the elevator up the stairs ahead.
Hee hee hee, the rooms are a surprise to behold.
No room changes allowed, hee hee hee.
How about a fortune? I’ll read everyone’s future!
Don’t mock me! Lost stuff, lost people—I can do it all!
A SOLDIER once called a hero.
"Moderate luck. Your fate will be lively."
"Lean on the kindness of others and push forward. Something shocking awaits after summer."
Hold up, lemme try one more, come on!
"Watch out for lost items. Lucky color: Black."
No, no, gimme one more shot!
"Seek, and you’ll surely meet. But you’ll lose what matters most."
Good or bad, I can’t tell!
What’s "what matters most" supposed to mean?
Normally, I’m way better at this!
Maybe I’m off my game today.
Welcome to the elevator to hell!
Oh, uh, yes! To the 4th floor we go!
There should be a reservation under Palmer.
Uh, it looks like it’s been canceled.
The Tonberry Room and Erigor Room you had reserved, well...
We just received a cancellation request from Mr. Palmer.
Well then, I’m off to have some fun.
Please enjoy our hotel’s finest rooms to your heart’s content.
I will rent you a room.
Man, I’m startin’ to miss Johnny’s cheap inn.
I’m steppin’ out for a bit.
Ain’t here to play—just takin’ a walk, a walk!
You better close your eyes and rest up proper. Seriously, you’re actin’ weird sometimes.
I will rent you a room.
Maybe I really am worn out.
Sorry, I couldn’t do anything for you.
Would you like to rest in bed?
I was worried if you’re okay~
Then how about we check out Gold Saucer together?
The gondola’s doing "couple time" right now, apparently.
Couple time? You mean that kind of couple?
Hmm, I wonder which kind of couple it is~?
I came to check on you. Thought you might need something.
I’m good. Maybe just short on sleep.
Red took off somewhere. Aerith and Yuffie are on the gondola.
Must be nice to hit it off so fast like those two, huh?
Maybe I’ve been pretending to be that way since I was a kid.
Hey, wanna take a walk together? It’s fine if you don’t want to.
So, wanna hang out and explore Gold Saucer with me?
Some stuff you can’t do solo, y’know?
What about Aerith and the others?
They’re off riding the gondola together. No consideration for the newbie here~!
You act like you’ve been with us forever, though.
Slippin’ in smooth and snaggin’ the goods~!
Guess I’ll go clear my head.
To the first-floor front desk, right?
Take your time and enjoy your stay.
If you’re heading out, I, "Guide Moogle", will guide you, kupo!
We look forward to serving you again, kupo!
Hope to see you again, kupo!
Guide Moogle will guide you, kupo!
Tell me where you’re headed, kupo!
I’ll show you the way, kupo~!
Guiding you to Battle Square, kupo!
The entrance gate’s up ahead, kupo. Have fun, kupo~!
Welcome to Wonder Square, kupo! Your access has been confirmed, kupo!
Welcome to Chocobo Square, kupo! Come visit the chocobos anytime, kupo!
Welcome to Speed Square, kupo! More squares added to my guiding list, kupo!
Welcome to Battle Square, kupo! Your pass has been updated, kupo!
Welcome to Event Square, kupo! Added to my guiding squares, kupo!
Welcome to Skywheel Square, kupo! My guiding squares just grew, kupo!
Hmm, what should I do~? This one, maybe!
Look, over there! Cloud’s favorite bike game!
No, I’ll check out how it compares to the real thing.
This place looks like fun. Hey, they’ve got a bike game too.
Seems like something Cloud would like.
No, I’ll check out how it compares to the real thing.
Game paradise~! Hey, hey, what should we play?
Ohh, into bikes, huh? Aerith and Tifa told me all about it~!
Let’s see that Shinra-scattering skill of yours~!
No, I’ll check out how it compares to the real thing.
I’ll check out how it compares to the real thing.
Wow, what a record! Cloud, you’re such a show-off~!
You struggled a tiny bit there, huh?
Huh? Cloud, are you bad at games?
Impressive! Have you gotten even better?
Looks like your skills haven’t dulled one bit.
Maybe you should practice here a little.
Not as great as you made it sound~! Did you really take down Shinra?
Oh, Cloud! So you showed up after all!
Guess you couldn’t resist Gold Saucer’s charm, huh?
Yup, got separated while I was eyeballing everything.
How about hanging out with us?
Nah, it’s fine...I can read the room, y’know!
Hmm, this is one heck of a race, rare even in recent years!
So, Cloud, which one do you think’ll win?
You can gauge their ability from their coat and muscle build.
The energy here’s wild. Could get dangerous if you get too into it.
Oh, wait, I haven’t bet yet!
Welcome to the Chocobo Festival! Please present your membership card.
This area is for members only.
Too bad, but can’t be helped.
Non-members can still enjoy watching on the big monitors over there.
Enjoy the chocobo battles on the monitors.
Looking forward to Rider Cloud’s race. Good luck out there!
Guess it’s Sam’s chocobo again, huh?
When Sam’s chocobo’s in a race, you’ve gotta bet with him in mind.
Ugh, if anyone but Sam won, I could’ve lived it up forever!
Look at the data, not your dreams. You know Sam’s win rate, right?
It ain’t 100 percent! That’s why it’s worth the gamble!
Ugh, I can’t deal with you.
Damn it, why can’t our chocobo win?!
Think it’s time to call it quits. Gotta snatch up a new chocobo soon.
The boss is probably pissed, huh?
Yeah, maybe it’s not just the chocobo—the rider matters too.
Wish a good chocobo and rider would just fall into our laps.
This is the riders’ lounge. No entry except for authorized personnel.
And now you’re already running around having fun.
What’s Tifa up to? Taking a break?
Yeah, my eyes are getting a little dazzled.
Yeah, but it’s hard to get used to this. All sparkly—like another world.
I’ll look around a bit more, then rest.
Watching the chocobos run made me miss Piko.
Oh, c’mon, what are you doing?! Take the inside, the inside!
Don’t tick me off...Pass ‘em quick—right there!
Next time, I’m counting on you. The start’s the key, got it?
Oh, not bad! Yes, yes, that’s the way!
Ahh...huh? Wait, wasn’t that a foul just now?!
Show ‘em what’s what! Give it back to ‘em!
Running into you here—what a coincidence!
Meeting again like this? Don’t tell me you’ve been chasing after me!
A deal in Costa went real smooth.
Figured I could stretch my wings a bit—no harm in that, right?
That con artist better not be cheating!
Quit fussing over me and go escort your girl proper.
It’s Gold Saucer, for cryin’ out loud. Don’t let her get bored!
What, you here solo? Nobody invited you along?
Geez, Gold Saucer’s wasted on you! Why not invite someone now?
That Sam guy’s makin’ a killing off these races, huh?
Maybe I should open a massage parlor Gold Saucer branch.
New recruits, welcome to the Space Knights!
We’ll jump right into the briefing for this mission. Listen up good.
Hey, Cloud, wanna join up too?
Is that how Cloud was as a rookie?
I’d like to think I was a bit better.
I wanna join the Space Knights too!
Rookies! Welcome to the Space Knights!
Now, let’s get straight to the briefing for this mission. Listen carefully.
We’ve received intel that the main fleet of the Gilgamesh forces has deployed behind the shadow of the seventh satellite.
Your task, as the vanguard, is to disrupt the enemy ranks.
This strategy is an all-or-nothing battle, both for the enemy and for us.
Our fate rests on your performance. Carry out this mission with everything you’ve got.
Would you like to ride the Shooting Coaster?
Cloud, looks like you’re good in space too, huh?
So, think you can handle space?
Even the great Cloud struggles with space, huh~
That was some impressive work for a rookie!
Not bad for a newbie, right?
Way to go, Cloud! Take me to real space someday, okay?
Maybe you should train with the Space Knights a bit longer.
Aw, I’m jealous~ Moments like this really scream couple, don’t they?
I wonder if there’s someone out there~ Someone who’d have fun with me.
They might seem nice, but they could be dangerous. Or just plain weird.
Could even be a Shinra trap.
I think I’ve got a decent eye for people, thank you very much.
Thanks for worrying about me, though. Enjoy your date!
Aw, c’mon, Cloud’s all shy now! Deep down, he’s thrilled a cute girl like me asked him out~!
How about being honest for once? You could even toss me a Materia as a gift!
Getting dragged around by a cute girl? Sounds like a win to me!
Aw, I’m jealous~ Moments like this really scream couple, don’t they?
I wonder if there’s someone out there~ Someone who’d have fun with me.
They might seem nice, but they could be dangerous. Or just plain weird.
Could even be a Shinra trap.
I think I’ve got a decent eye for people, thank you very much.
Thanks for worrying about me, though.
Guess I’ll go look for Red and hang out.
Still, better not get too close, huh?
Still, maybe we should keep our distance.
Ugh, why’re they here?! Are they chasing us or what?
Guess I’ll let ‘em off the hook for today.
Making a scene here would be a hassle.
Care to take on the Muscle Colosseum?
How about blowing off some steam at the Muscle Colosseum?
We look forward to your next challenge!
Come back and join us anytime!
Please continue enjoying the Gold Saucer!
An Avalanche comrade. Died in Sector 7.
Tried to befriend me, even though I was standoffish.
You’re oblivious to that stuff, aren’t you, Cloud?
She teased me a lot, but I got that much. I’m not that dense.
Young man, you’ve got a lot to learn.
Just when I was getting used to the slums, I got caught up in some trouble.
That’s when Jessie saved me. That’s how it all started.
She was this cool, big-city girl.
Lucky you, scoring a beauty like that!
See, Cloud’s destined to be surrounded by hotties!
Should I thank fate or what?
For the rest of your reward, come to my place once you’re back down.
Ingredients are marque, luche, black million, and red sili.
Jessie’s play...Should I check it out?
Jessie performed on this stage, right?
Looks like they’re on a break.
Jessie must’ve played all kinds of roles here, huh?
That lady in the photo was on this stage, right?
Got chased around by kids and ran off. They think I’m a mascot or something.
Did you stop by my room earlier?
I checked on you, but you were asleep, so I left you alone.
No, that wasn’t me. Maybe Barret?
If you’re here to take on the Colosseum, I’ll lend a paw.
If you’re here to take on the Colosseum, I’ll lend a paw.
I’ll lay low here for a bit.
Got chased around by kids and ran off. They think I’m a mascot or something.
I’ll lay low here for a bit.
Due to current crowding, we’re restricting entry for now!
Aw, oh well. Let’s check out something else.
It’s pretty popular, huh? Let’s come back after exploring a bit.
Ugh, lame! Let’s hit up everything else and swing back!
To all visitors of the Gold Saucer, thank you for your patience.
Entry restrictions at Skywheel Square have now been lifted.
Please enjoy a gondola ride through the skies at Skywheel Square.
This time slot is reserved for Couple Time.
Bring your lover or friend, and the gondola will take you on a journey around the Gold Saucer.
The dazzling scenery framed by the window feels like a private art gallery just for two.
Enjoy this blissful moment to your heart’s content.
We’re currently experiencing an electrical issue within the park.
We’re investigating the cause, but just to be safe,
we’ll now guide all guests to a secure location.
This way, please. Follow the staff ahead of you.
Over here! Take your time, no need to rush!
Cloud, laddie! We’re in a right mess!
Get to the Colosseum, quick as ye can!
There’s been a shootin’ in the Colosseum lobby!
Witnesses say the culprit was a "man with a gun for an arm"!
I’ll round up the others, so ye hightail it to the Colosseum!

Wow, we gotta line up quick!

We’re currently guiding guests due to equipment maintenance.
The cause of the issue is still under investigation.
Please follow the staff’s instructions and proceed slowly.
Staff are guiding you. Please stay calm and move along.
There’s no danger, so don’t panic. Follow the person in front of you.
Sorry, but this area’s off-limits right now.
Shinra soldiers got attacked. And then—
Welcome, young ones, to my shining paradise, the Gold Saucer!
You’re already a battle comrade, aren’t you? I’m always up for a rematch.
Today, a Shinra executive came by, but the soldiers with him got attacked.
Some staff and other guests got caught up in it too.
The surveillance cameras were cleverly destroyed,
so we couldn’t ID the culprit, but according to witnesses,
the perp had a gun built into one arm.
It reminded me of a certain person of interest I’d been warned about.
A big guy—not as impressive as me, mind you—with a loud attitude and voice,
wearing sunglasses, never hiding his sour face, and—
a man with a gun for an arm.
So, what do you think? You lot must have some idea who I mean.
Barret can get rowdy, sure, but he’d never do something this awful.
I’d love to believe that, but...
Smashing the cameras first? That’s not his style.
If he caused an incident like this, he’d have a reason,
and if that were the case, he wouldn’t bother with the cameras.
Good, good! Beautiful friendship is my favorite dish!
But this is a major incident.
Catch the real culprit yourselves and prove your friend’s innocence.
If you don’t catch the perp by then, I’ll detain you all and hand you over to Shinra.
So I can keep tabs on you and make sure you don’t run.
Don’t let the Turks beat you to it!
A little competition gets the blood pumping, right?
Now, young ones! The culprit went down below!
The lift down to the surface is this way!
I’ll catch that culprit, no matter what.
They’ll regret sullying my paradise, mark my words.
Where we’re headed is called Under Saucer,
a place where the staff used to live back in the day.
But then monsters started creepin’ in, so they moved the lodgings up top.
And wouldn’t ye know it, outlaws from all over started settlin’ down here instead.
Aye, but even worse than that!
They say once ye step inside, ye’ll never get out again.
So now, folks call it this:
So, everyone, watch yerselves down there, aye~!
Welcome to Corel Prison, Cloud the handyman!
Nah, I know who it is. You’re Cloud, right!
Hey, c’mon, first time meetin’, obviously.
Ain’t nobody meets me and forgets the great me!
But me? I know all about you, one-sided like.
Foh! Alright, I’ll clue ya in.
When word gets out a guy took down the Corneo Family, you bet I’d dig into it.
We’re looking for a man with a gun—
Yeah, yeah, I know, I know. Don’t make me say "info’s life" twice.
I’ve got the full scoop on what went down up there.
So I’ve got a job for a slick handyman like you.
That "man with a gun arm" you’re after? I’ve already got him locked up.
Right here in the desert jail.
I could tell ya where he is. Special favor, just for you!
But the world’s all give-and-take, ain’t it?
So you’re gonna bring me some cash.
I’m in dire need of a ton of gil right now!
Some lunatic jackass went and slaughtered Shinra soldiers without my say-so.
Handin’ over the perp ain’t enough to fix this now.
To protect Corel Prison, I need tribute money. A ridiculous amount!
Damn! Damn! Damn! Damn! DAMN IT—!
You, Mr. Handyman, are gonna get me that cash. Yeah, I know, don’t worry.
I’ve got a plan for how you’ll earn it.
You, handyman, are gonna race chocobos and win.
I’ll hold onto your pals till you win.
Whoa, relax. I’ll treat ‘em real nice.
But if you don’t bring the cash, they might have to earn it for me instead~!
Plenty of folks here like animals too, y’know?
This guy’ll give ya the nitty-gritty on the race!
Alright, I’ll take you to the chocobo. Follow me!
Try runnin’ off, and I’ll bury you in the desert!
Hey, hey, where you think you’re goin’?
Don’t wander off on your own!
We’ll be fine, so don’t worry.
Good luck with the chocobo race!
You jerk~! What’re you gonna do with me~?
If push comes to shove, I’ll use my ninja skills...
Back in a cage again, huh...
At least this time I’ve got company.
You’re our only hope now, Cloud~
So you’re Cloud, the handyman, huh?
Hmm, not a bad-looking guy, are you?
I’m Esther, the chocobo manager. Nice to meet you!
What? You two know each other?
I came to Gold Saucer to enter Piko in the chocobo races, but...
Hey, hey, don’t make it sound so bad!
We saved you when you were lost in the desert, didn’t we?
The desert’s taken a toll on him—first time and all.
Unless we feed him well and get his stamina back, winning the race is gonna be tough.
That’s why I need you, Cloud, to go find some food for little Piko first!
Alright, once you’ve got the food, bring it back to me!
Oh, can’t find any veggies? Let’s see~
I think the tavern master has a farm. Might be worth asking him.
I saw some shady seminar guy buying veggies, but...
If you rough up those creepy stalkers tailing you, you might just snag some!
The collector running the card game’s got a stash of veggies. Why not ask him?
I think they’re a prize in that "Desert Rush" game, though.
You could try taking on the "Battle Club" underground too~
Well, good luck hunting them down!
Whoa there, thinkin’ of makin’ a break for it?
It’s just desert out there. Wanna dry up and die?
Don’t care what happens to your buddies, huh?
Hold it, you’re not goin’ in there.
No need to worry about your pals.
Looks like you scored some nice veggies!
Yeah, not bad. If I’m picky, I’d say he could use a bit more.
Yep, perfect! He’s ready to race anytime now!
Gus’ll guide you to the race venue. Give him a shout!
Oh, and if you’ve got extra veggies, I’ll trade you some race parts for ‘em!
Veggies are rare around here, so I’ll buy ‘em off you!
Which parts you wanna trade for?
Looks like you nabbed some quality veggies!
Which parts would you like to trade for?
If you find more veggies, bring ‘em my way!
Gotta stock up for the next chocobo!
Now just win that race—go get ‘em!
Piko’s all set. Now it’s up to your skills, Cloud!
Can’t wait to see how this handyman handles a race!
Don’t let Guess down, got it?
Quit standin’ around—go find that food!
Alright, I’ll take you up to the race venue.
Hey, no—I’ll escort him myself. That cool with you?
Wha—? Ugh, just ‘cause he’s a little good-looking!
Don’t let the other racers look down on ya!
Who’d have thought Piko’d bounce back like this?
When he got to the prison, he was one step from a mummy—chirpin’ so weak he couldn’t scare a mouse!
Now he’s a whole new bird! This could be promising.
But no matter how great the chocobo is, a lousy rider’ll still lose the race.
I’ve seen plenty of top-notch chocobos with speed and stamina get wrecked by useless riders.
It’s up to the rider to make or break it. So, how about you, Cloud?
We’ll take the chocobo from here. You folks wait in the lounge.
Stay outta sight of the crowd, got it?
Hey, Esther. Lookin’ gorgeous as always.
This is Joe, Sam’s personal racer.
Hate to say it, but he’s the top dog among active chocobo racers.
He’s our hot new prospect, I’d say. Keep an eye on him—it’ll be worth it!
So either he’s somethin’ special, or just a pretty face.
I welcome a good rival. Hope you’re not all talk.
Alright, hang tight ‘til the race starts.
If you wanna practice for the chocobo race, use that simulator over there!
First time racin’, right? You should definitely practice.
Joe’s partner’s "Hyperion". Fastest, toughest chocobo out there.
Lookin’ forward to a dazzling debut!
Not gonna practice for the race?
If you’re racin’, you gotta win—especially against Sam’s chocobo!
To put Green Ranch on the map, you’ve gotta come out on top, Cloud!
First race against Joe? Tough break.
Well, try not to get crushed.
I’m focusin’ here—don’t talk to me.
Beat Joe and get famous...Beat Joe and get famous...
Hey, newbie! Go easy on me, huh?
Say, how about we team up and take Joe down together?
Participants in the next race, please proceed to the paddock.
<color=yellow>Special Event Race: "Chocobo Cup"</color> Ready to take it on?
Did you know? I just got attacked!
Wait, you mean the coliseum thing...?
Yep, that’s the one! But I was in the bathroom, so I made it out!
Right? That’s why I’ve got a good feeling about winning today!
That parfait—got any lard in it? Lots of it, nice and sloshy!
So hot! I’m gonna die out here!
Seriously, why are Turks’ uniforms black anyway?!
We’ll join up once we’re done here.
Oh, and bring something cold to drink! Ice cream works too!
Your precious junior’s gonna shrivel up out here! You hear me?
Ugh, damn it. More races to go—win the next one!
Let me know when you’re ready.
Maybe we should tweak him more for racing.
Bring me some veggies, and I’ll trade you race parts!
Let me know when you’re ready.
Hey, you okay? I’m startin’ to worry here.
Let me know when you’re ready.
Let me know when you’re ready.
Can’t let a loss define you, right?
Hey, Cloud, good to see ya!
Got any veggies? I’ll swap ‘em for race parts!
This is the last part. Thanks for all the veggies!
Hey, why not hire me as your chocobo advisor?
If war breaks out, the good chocobos’ll get snatched up first!
Can’t they just knock it off?
Heard you won the Gold Cup—congrats!
Piko’s tuned up perfect. If you lose now, it’s on you, Cloud!
Piko’s pretty bummed. Next time, he says no losing!
Hyahahaha! Whoo! You did it, handyman!
I believed in ya, man—you’re the real deal!
This is a desert, y’know? Get hot—let those emotions explode!
Now it’s your turn to keep your promise.
I got it. I’m a man of my word!
Pushy guys don’t get the ladies, y’know?
